item.title: fire-leak - ASIS CTF Finals 2024
item.author: Salvatore Abello
item.description: This year, I played in the ASIS CTF Finals with @TheRomanXpl0it, and we secured 7th place at the end of the CTF. I decided to write this up because I’ve never seen a similar challenge before. @simonedimaria and I worked on this challenge and solved it after about 8 hours. Overview As the name suggests, this is an XS-Leak challenge. We’re given the source code and there are three endpoints.
